title: BRIEF-Medmen Announces Termination Of Merger Agreement With PharmaCann And Management Changes
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-Medmen Announces Termination Of Merger Agreement With PharmaCann And Management Changes

Oct 8 (Reuters) - Medmen Enterprises Inc :

* MEDMEN ANNOUNCES TERMINATION OF MERGER AGREEMENT WITH PHARMACANN AND MANAGEMENT CHANGES

* MEDMEN ENTERPRISES INC - MEDMEN WILL BE COMPENSATED WITH RETAIL AND CULTIVATION ASSETS IN ILLINOIS AND VIRGINIA

* MEDMEN ENTERPRISES INC - APPOINTS ZEESHAN HYDER AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY

* MEDMEN ENTERPRISES INC - MEDMEN IS TARGETING BREAK EVEN EBITDA BY END OF CALENDAR 2020

* MEDMEN ENTERPRISES INC - PHARMACANN HAS AGREED TO PAY A TERMINATION FEE TO MEDMEN THROUGH A TRANSFER OF MEMBERSHIP INTERESTS

* MEDMEN ENTERPRISES INC - HYDER SUCCEEDS MICHAEL KRAMER, WHOSE EMPLOYMENT HAS BEEN TERMINATED AS OF OCTOBER 7, 2019

* MEDMEN ENTERPRISES INC - CLOSING TIMELINE FOR TRANSACTION WAS SIGNIFICANTLY IMPACTED GIVEN REGULATORY HURDLES AT FEDERAL AND STATE LEVEL
description: BRIEF-Medmen Announces Termination Of Merger Agreement With PharmaCann And Management Changes
